statements: UPDATE circuit_designs SET circuit_name = 'New Name' WHERE circuit_id = 1
UPDATE circuit_designs SET configuration = '{"key": "value"}', circuit_description = 'New Description' WHERE circuit_id = 2
UPDATE circuit_designs SET circuit_name = 'New Circuit Name', configuration = '{"param1": "value1", "param2": "value2"}' WHERE circuit_id = 1
UPDATE circuit_designs SET configuration = '{"param3": "value3", "param4": "value4"}', circuit_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE circuit_id = 2
UPDATE circuits SET circuit_name = 'New Circuit Name' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE simulations SET circuit_id = 2, simulation_name = 'Updated Simulation' WHERE simulation_id = 3;
